## Pharmaceutical industrial chain

5 components:

1. Research and development
2. Manufacturing
3. Commercialization
4. Distribution (hospitals, pharmacies, online)
5. Payers (health insurance, commercial insurance, self-payment)




Types of pharmaceutical companies

* Brand developers (MNC - multi-national corporations)
* Generic drug manufacturers
* Research and development focused
* CRO, CMO 
* Biotechnology
* Medical devices
